ALREADY_EXISTS: The provided {property} is already in use.
CREDENTIALS_EXPIRED: The provided refresh token has expired.
ALREADY_ACTIVATED: The provided email is related to an account that has already been activated.
NOT_ACTIVATED: The provided email is related to an account that hasn't been be activated.
WRONG_CODE: The provided value for {property} doesn't match
SAME_PASSWORD: The provided password is the same as the old one.
